Class StudentDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.StudentDAO
public class StudentDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for Student entities. Provides CRUD operations for the Student table in the database.

    • getStudentById

      public Optional<Student> getStudentById(int studentId)
      Retrieves a student by their ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to retrieve
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the student if found, or empty if not found

      Updates an existing student record.
      Parameters:
      student - The student object with updated information
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteStudent

      public boolean deleteStudent(int studentId)
      Deletes a student from the database.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • addStudentWithValidation

      public int addStudentWithValidation(Student student) throws SQLException, IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a student with validation for parent and class existence.
      Parameters:
      student - The student to add
      Returns:
      The generated student ID if successful
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs
      IllegalArgumentException - If validation fails
